title: City Lights
description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

title: M
description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

title: Frankenstein
description: Dr. Frankenstein dares to tamper with life and death by creating a human monster out of lifeless body parts.

title: Dracula
description: Transylvanian vampire Count Dracula bends a naive real estate agent to his will, then takes up residence at a London estate where he sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night.

title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.

title: The Public Enemy
description: A young hoodlum rises up the ranks of the Chicago underworld, even as a gangster's accidental death threatens to spark a bloody mob war.

title: Little Caesar
description: A small-time crook climbs the ranks of the mob to become a top gangster, but his rise is marred by his friend's desire to leave the life.

title: Monkey Business
description: Four stowaways on a ship to America get involved with two gangsters and the daughter of a gangster.

title: Cimarron
description: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.

title: The Champ
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: An alcoholic former heavyweight contender tries to make a comeback to support his young son.

title: Tabu: A Story of the South Seas
description: In the South Seas, a Tahitian fisherman and a young woman fall in love, but their relationship is forbidden by tribal law.

title: À Nous la Liberté
description: Two prison friends escape; one becomes a wealthy industrialist, while the other remains a vagabond, leading to a satirical look at industrialization.

title: The Front Page
description: A newspaper editor and a reporter cover the execution of a man convicted of murder in Chicago.

title: Le Million
description: A debt-ridden artist discovers he has won the lottery, but his ticket is in the pocket of a jacket he left at a friend's house.

title: Marius
description: The owner of a waterfront bar in Marseille struggles with his son's desire to go to sea and his love for a local girl.

title: La Chienne
description: A mild-mannered cashier and amateur painter falls in love with a prostitute who, along with her pimp, exploits him.

title: Bad Girl
description: A cynical young man and a woman who doesn't trust men fall in love and struggle with marriage and impending parenthood.

title: A Free Soul
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: An alcoholic lawyer defends a mobster on a murder charge, only to have his daughter fall in love with the criminal.

title: Skippy
description: The adventures of a mischievous young boy and his friends in the shantytown.

title: Mata Hari
description: In 1917, an exotic dancer uses her powers of seduction to spy for Germany during World War I.

title: Possessed
description: A factory girl rises to power as the mistress of a wealthy lawyer, but their romance threatens his political career.

title: Platinum Blonde
description: A reporter marries a wealthy socialite but soon finds he dislikes the upper-class lifestyle.

title: Street Scene
description: Twenty-four hours in the lives of the residents of a New York City tenement, focusing on a young woman and her affair with a married man.

title: Night Nurse
description: A private nurse uncovers a plot to starve two children to death to get their trust fund money.

title: The Miracle Woman
description: A bitter minister's daughter teams up with a con man to perform fake miracles.

title: Blonde Crazy
description: A bellhop and a chambermaid team up to con hotel guests, but their scams become increasingly dangerous.

title: Smart Money
description: A barber with a lucky streak becomes a big-time gambler, but his luck runs out when he tries to help a woman.

title: Five Star Final
description: A newspaper editor revives a 20-year-old murder case to boost circulation, with tragic consequences for the people involved.

title: The Guardsman
description: A jealous husband disguises himself as a guardsman to test his wife's fidelity.

title: Trader Horn
description: An animal trapper and his partner search the African jungle for a missionary's daughter who was abducted as a child.

title: Arrowsmith
description: A young doctor struggles with the conflict between his desire to do pure research and the need to make a living.

title: Waterloo Bridge
description: An American chorus girl stranded in London during WWI resorts to prostitution and falls in love with a soldier, hiding her past from him.

title: The Smiling Lieutenant
description: A lieutenant in the Austrian army is forced to marry a princess instead of the violin player he loves.

title: Dishonored
description: A prostitute becomes a spy for the Austrian Secret Service during World War I and falls in love with a Russian agent.

title: Safe in Hell
description: A woman flees to a Caribbean island to escape a murder charge, only to find herself in a den of criminals.

title: The Criminal Code
description: A district attorney becomes warden of a prison and faces a dilemma when a young inmate falls in love with his daughter.

title: Svengali
description: A music teacher uses hypnosis to control a young woman and make her a famous singer.

title: The Mad Genius
description: A crippled puppeteer rescues a boy from an abusive father and turns him into a famous dancer, but tries to control his life.

title: Private Lives
description: A divorced couple meets again while honeymooning with their new spouses and realize they still have feelings for each other.

title: Susan Lenox (Her Fall and Rise)
description: A woman runs away from an arranged marriage and falls in love with an engineer, but circumstances force them apart.

title: Kameradschaft
description: German miners rescue French miners from an underground fire and explosion, overcoming national hostilities.

title: Mädchen in Uniform
description: A sensitive student at an all-girls boarding school falls in love with her teacher.

title: Rich and Strange
description: A couple receive a large inheritance and go on a world cruise, where they both have affairs and face disaster.

title: The Skin Game
description: A feud develops between two families in the English countryside when a nouveau riche industrialist tries to buy land from an established aristocratic family.

title: Tonight or Never
description: An opera singer is told she will never be great until she experiences true love.

title: Indiscreet
description: A woman tries to stop her sister from marrying her former lover.

title: Delicious
description: A Scottish immigrant girl arrives in New York and falls in love with a wealthy polo player.

title: Iron Man
description: A prizefighter is deserted by his wife when he loses the championship, but she returns when he wins it back.

title: Parlor, Bedroom and Bath
description: A shy man is hired to pose as a great lover to help a husband make his wife jealous.

title: The Black Camel
description: Charlie Chan investigates the murder of a movie star in Hawaii.

title: The Sin of Madelon Claudet
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: A woman turns to a life of crime and prostitution to support her son, keeping her identity a secret from him.
